properties.entry: SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_STATUS='N' ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC
INSERT INTO FAQ ( FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT , FAQ_CATEGORY , MEM_NO , FAQ_ENROLL_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_FAQNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )
UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_COUNT = FAQ_COUNT + 1 WHERE FAQ_NO = ? AND FAQ_STATUS = 'Y';
